name: Login With Google reCaptcha For WordPress And Woocomerce
author: Evgeniy Poznyak

sections.description: This plugin is implements Google reCaptcha to WordPress\Woocommerce Login page and hide user/password errors (optional).
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate plugin.

  2. Go to Settings > Login with reCaptcha

  3. Go to https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin
    And get your API Keys.

  4. Place your Google reCaptcha Site Key

  5. Place your Google reCaptcha Secret Key

  6. Choice Theme (optional)

  7. Choice Size (optional)

  8. Choice Hide Errors (optional)

  • If you choose errors “Hide”, if the usernames matches – it will show that the user does not exist.
    That way, hackers won’t know if your username exists.
sections.faq:

  4. Place your Google reCaptcha Site Key

  5. Place your Google reCaptcha Secret Key

  6. Choice Theme (optional)

  7. Choice Size (optional)

  8. Choice Hide Errors (optional)

  • If you choose errors “Hide”, if the usernames matches – it will show that the user does not exist.
    That way, hackers won’t know if your username exists.

short_description: Extended WordPress\Woocomerce Login With Google reCaptcha and hiding user/password errors
description: This plugin is implements Google reCaptcha to WordPress\Woocommerce Login page and hide user/password errors (optional).

screenshots.caption: Go to Settings > Login with reCaptcha. Place your Google reCaptcha Site Key. Place your Google reCaptcha Secret Key.
If you choose errors "Hide", if the usernames matches - it will show that the user does not exist. That way, hackers won't know if your username exists.
It's also available on woocommerce login page.
